meta.content: South Central USD 5 - School Closure: eLearning Information & More

Lesson Plans and Lunch Information - All eLearning classes will officially begin on Monday, March 30th, while some have started already. Click the link HERE to see the lesson plans for our district's teachers. Please click on the links below for the following resources:

div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 11:53 am CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 66. Windy, with a north northwest wind 20 to 30 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 40. North wind 10 to 15 mph decreasing to 5 to 10 mph in the evening. Winds could gust as high as 25 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 77. West wind 5 to 10 mph becoming south in the afternoon.

div.div: Your session will expire in 0 minutes.

div.p: All eLearning classes will officially begin on Monday, March 30th, while some have started already. Click the link HERE to see the lesson plans for our district's teachers. Please click on the links below for the following resources:

ul.li: SeeSaw for Preschool & Elementary (both parents/guardians will have an account -- Student accounts are on SeeSaw CLASS while family accounts are on the SeeSaw FAMILY app)

Video Conferencing is being held on a variety of platforms, mostly Zoom and Google Meet --> You will need the specific teacher's Zoom or Google Meet link to meet up online with the class & those are linked in the lesson plans above
PowerSchool is where you can check your child's participation in classes online

If our SCNUSD #5 students do not have internet, we are asking you to please contact Amanda Skalka at askalka@southcentralusd.us, as she is working with several providers to try to get internet to our family's homes. NOTE: In some cases, this is not possible due to line of sight issues for the provider or not being able to come into the homes during this time.

li.a: LN Preschool & Elementary Classroom Meeting Times & Links

ul.li: LN MS/HS Classroom Meeting Times (links are above in the lesson plans)

li.a: SC Preschool & Elementary Classroom Meeting Times & Links
SC MS/HS Classroom Meeting Times & Links

div.p: If you would like added to the district's breakfast & lunch program, please fill out the Google Form at http://bit.ly/COVID19LunchSurvey. Starting on Mon., Mar. 30th, meals will be delivered Monday - Thursday, and Thursday's meal will include Friday's breakfast & lunch AND Monday's breakfast items.

Please understand that lunch times vary daily, so there are times that the drivers may be running a little earlier or later for delivery, especially in the rural areas. The delivery includes lunch for that day, and breakfast for the following morning. Any child 18 and under in the district qualifies for the program (your lunch status does not matter), and there is no cost. If there is a day(s) that you will be gone & don't need the lunch, please call and leave a message at 402-726-2151.

em.strong: If you have a negative lunch balance from previously in the school year, we encourage you to mail your checks to:

div.p: Lawrence/Nelson School (this includes preschool through high school lunches)
Sandy Creek (for all preschool - high school lunch balances)

strong.em: Please note that all phone calls to the Lawrence/Nelson Preschool & Elementary School secretary are now being forwarded to the middle/high school in Nelson, as the preschool/elementary secretary is out on maternity leave! The number to the MS/HS in Nelson is 402-225-3371, and the extension is 6100.
